commit message:
New launcher icon

Headphones + Vanilla Music icon reflect the purpose of the app.

Merge pull request #5 from relan/launcher-icon

New launcher icon

Reformat AndroidManifest.xml

Use tabs instead of spaces, fix indentation.

Put <uses-permission> before <application>

In the past there have been subtle bugs (such as themes not getting
applied correctly) when the <application> tag appears before some of
other elements.

Check recieved intent action string

Avoid possibility for another actor to send a spoofed intent.

Explicitly permit backups

The app does not keep any private data, so backups won't make any harm.
This commit does not really change anything because android:allowBackup
is true by default.

Bump target SDK to 23

This does not give anything, but let it be up to date.

Merge pull request #6 from relan/lint

Fix various issues reported by lint
